description:
*** FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME *** 

Greatest Road helps you find the most fun, scenic and beautiful routes, not just the fastest or shortest way of getting where you're going. With recommendations in over 160 countries, the app offers you the most entertaining rides based on recommendations from local people with the same app. 

Now, in version 4, you can tap into all the recommendations of Yelp.com.  Find a place to stop along the route you’ve selected, or pick a destination then look for the most fun, most scenic way of getting there. 

> Identify all the stretches you’ve ridden 
> Add your favorite roads in minutes 
> Rate or comment on existing roads 
> Show off your bike by taking a picture for your profile 
> Post your favorite roads on Facebook 
> Share directions and drives with friends who have iPhones, iPads, iPod touches, other smartphones or even standalone GPS devices 

WHAT OTHERS ARE SAYING: 
=================================== 
"Great way to find neat roads close and far from home!" 

"This is one of my favorite apps!! I love to ride and this helps me chose the choicest places to ride!! This app gives riders the option of rating and sharing their best rides. All riders should jump on this app and add to it. More riders use and share the better the app becomes!! Let's all add our favorite road. This is one that we the users built! How cool is that!!" 

"Well designed, easy to add your own routes. Should age well as more riders add to the inventory." 

"What a killer app for motorcyclists! It's almost like getting pointers from the locals, everywhere I ride. In the spirit of making it better for everyone, I'm going to add a few rides me too. You know the quality of the list is going to stay high since anyone can rate the rides too." 

"App is great. Spread the word as more users needed." 
=================================== 

Now supports NAVIGON! Install a Navigon app on your iOS device, then tap Start Ride on the page for any stretch! 

Post any stretch to Facebook, flag any stretch as a duplicate or low quality, or sort your rides based on rating, distance or other measures. 

Add your own route in minutes or add comments or star ratings to what’s already there. Post your favorites on Facebook. Email the ride to friends with iPhones, iPads, iPod touches or even just standalone GPSes.
trackCensoredName: Greatest Road Motorcycle Rider GPS Road Finder
trackName: Greatest Road Motorcycle Rider GPS Road Finder
releaseNotes:
Now with 100% more Yelp! Looking for a good place to stop and eat along that fun ride? Want to find a hot destination then the most scenic way of getting there? Greatest Road is now connected with Yelp, so you can find places to eat along your route, or find the most fun, scenic ways of getting to the best destinations! 

Also: 
- iPhone 5/iOS 7 support 
- several small bug fixes
